text: Paul James "Mackenzie" Crook (born 29 September 1971) is a British actor, writer, director and comedian. He is best known for playing Gareth Keenan in The Office, Ragetti in the Pirates of the Caribbean movies and Orell in the HBO series Game of Thrones. He is also the creator and star of the BBC Four sitcom Detectorists. The series earnt him a BAFTA Award in 2015. Crook was born in Maidstone, Kent, England. He grew up in Dartford, Kent. He has been married to Lindsay since April 2001. The couple have two children, a son and a daughter. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Kent Category:BAFTA Award winning writers Category:British stand-up comedians Category:Comedians from Kent Category:English movie actors Category:English screenwriters Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:English television directors Category:Writers from Kent
title: Mackenzie Crook
